item.title: Tmux and Copy to Clipboard
item.description:
Problem: Automatic copy to clipboard doesn’t work

  • When ssh’d to a remote server
  • Running tmux
  • From a Ghostty terminal window

But does work:

  • When not running tmux, everything else the same.

Solution: On the remote server, update `~/.tmux.conf and add the line:

set -g allow-passthrough on

References:

  • GitHub Issue

item.title: Tmux, Ghostty, and Shift-Enter
item.description:
Problem: Shift-enter doesn’t work

  • When ssh’d to a remote server
  • Running tmux
  • From a Ghostty terminal window

But does work:

  • When not running tmux, everything else the same.

Solution: Update Ghostty settings and add the line:

keybind = shift+enter=text:\x1b\r

On the remote server, update `~/.tmux.conf and add the line:

set -s extended-keys on

References:

  • GitHub Issue
